channel.title: Products on Data, Smarter.
channel.description: Recent content in Products on Data, Smarter.

item.title: Introducing Crunchbox
item.description: The easiest and quickest way for anyone, with zero training, to slice and dice survey data.

item.title: Collaborate productively
item.description: Deliver survey data and analytics to your company and customers — controlling who sees what and what they can do with it. Researchers can work on the data visually, creating crosstabs, charts, filters, analyses, complete decks, and fine-grained tab books, all without programming or ever having to worry about fragile data files. At the same time, data scientists can use the powerful Crunch API to dig deeper using R or Python.

item.title: Crunch speaks research
item.description: Crunch does things conventional databases and BI tools don’t — with native support for weighting, survey questions and question wording, and missing-data handling from the bottom up.

item.title: A modern platform
item.description: Your data lives in Crunch’s high-performance, columnar data store. Instantly search across your datasets, combine them on-the-fly, and analyze them interactively.
